content: Kyumin Lee Associate Professor Worcester Polytechnic Institute (WPI) ì´ê·ë¯¼ Home Infolab People Publications Resources Teaching Service Bio Kyumin Lee Associate Professor Infolab Computer Science Department Data Science Program Artificial Intelligence Program Worcester Polytechnic Institute Unity Hall 363 100 Institute Road Worcester, MA 01609-2280 Office: (508) 831-6826 kmlee (at) wpi.edu I lead Infolab at WPI. My primary research interests are in social computing, artificial intelligence, machine learning, natural language processing, and information retrieval, over large-scale systems like the Web and social media. I focus on threats to these systems and design methods to mitigate negative behaviors (e.g., misinformation, hate speech), and look for positive opportunities to mine and analyze these systems for developing next generation algorithms and architectures (e.g., recommender system, natural language understanding). I also focus on AI for social good (e.g., disrupting wildlife trafficking networks).
